1.title: Y2K
1.plot: The origin story of how the Hollywood Darlings became best friends told through a series of flashbacks to New Years Eve, 1999.

2.title: Till Death Gets Me a Part
2.plot: After a string of bad dates, Jodie tries a new celebrity dating app in hopes of finding a guy who's not just into her for being Stephanie Tanner. Christine goes method when she lands an acting role as a Russian prostitute on TV. When Beverley is forced to find a new preschool for her kids to attend last minute, she hosts a dinner party to try and win over the Headmaster of the school. Enlisting the help of her best friends, everything comes to a head at Beverley's dinner party when Jodie shows up with her celebrity date and Christine shows up in character. Matthew ...

3.title: Star Crossed Mothers
3.plot: After a string of bad dates, Jodie tries a new celebrity dating app in hopes of finding a guy who's not just into her for being Stephanie Tanner. Christine goes method when she lands an acting role as a Russian prostitute on TV. When Beverley is forced to find a new preschool for her kids to attend last minute, she hosts a dinner party to try and win over the Headmaster of the school. Enlisting the help of her best friends, everything comes to a head at Beverley's dinner party when Jodie shows up with her celebrity date and Christine shows up in character. Matthew ...

4.title: The Nilf
4.plot: When Beverley finds out her nanny used to do porn and Christine is in need of a last minute babysitter, Bev jumps at the chance to pawn the porn nanny off without having to fire her. Per the porn nanny's request, Beverley and Christine make it their mission to help her get back into the porn business with some coaching, acting, and personal favors. Jodie helps her daughter with a school project and gets a B. In an effort to redeem herself and get a better grade, Jodie keeps doing homework assignments until she finds herself called in for her own parent-teacher ...

5.title: Ovulation Staycation
5.plot: The Darlings take a girl's trip for the weekend. When Jodie spots an ex-boyfriend that she ghosted recently, she tries to avoid him but is forced to come up with an excuse for dissappearing when they finally run into each other. Christine and Brandon are trying to have a baby and when Christine starts ovulating she sneaks Brandon into the hotel so they can try and meet up for a quickie. Beverley accidentally eats a pot brownie. This staycation is one they will never forget, except maybe Bev. Sarunas Jackson guest stars.

6.title: Members Only
6.plot: Tired of the lame couples they hang out with, Christine and Brandon come on strong as they try and win over a new cool couple they want to double-date. Beverley and Jodie run into an old friend who tries to enlist their help with a protest she's spearheading against erecting a naked statue in their children's local park. When Jodie takes a hard stance in defense of the statue, Beverley finds herself in between a chiseled rock and a hard place and has to decide which friend's side she's going to take.

7.title: Dry Spells
7.plot: When a group of teenage girls put a curse on Beverley and Christine, they laugh it off. But when the Darlings start to experience a string of bad luck Beverley and Christine become convinced the curse is real and seek help from a local witch store owner and her coven of witches. Jodie, convinced her dating life is the only thing that's cursed, decides to revisit the very first kiss she ever had, which just happened to be on screen as Stephanie Tanner in Full House. Reconnecting as adults, Jodie and "Rusty" go out on a date to see if they can rekindle their old ...

8.title: White Little Lies
8.plot: When Beverley, Jodie, and Christine are invited to be a part of an elite and exclusive group of moms, they try and make a great first impression by offering to plan a birthday party for one of the kids in the group. Things start to get messy as the Darlings scramble to put together the perfect party. In this homage to Big Little Lies, we recount the story of events as told through a series of confessionals from each Darling's perspective on the day of the infamous birthday party. Tatyana Ali guest stars.

1.title: How Christine Got Her Groove Back
1.plot: Christine takes Beverley to Andrew Keegan's Full Circle spiritual church for a day of unconventional relaxation; Jodie teaches Andrea Barber's acting class for children but learns they are interested in more than improvisational games.

2.title: My So-Called Prom
2.plot: Beverley and Christine recreate childhood rites of passages; Christine forces a teenage boy to take her to his prom, while Beverley plans an epic slumber party; Jodie is reunited with Mr. Bear, a stuffed animal she had while on Full House (1987).

3.title: Driving Miss Jodie
3.plot: Jodie must choose between a sports car and a minivan; Christine's dream of participating in an exclusive yoga class is thwarted by a loud-breathing celebrity classmate.

4.title: Got Milk?
4.plot: When a video of Christine defending her right to breastfeed in public goes viral, she unexpectedly becomes the face of a militant charitable organization who strong-arm her into leading their cause. Frugal Beverley takes a job at a high-end, furniture store to get the employee discount, but her hopes of not getting spotted by the public are quickly under threat. Jaleel White and DeAnna Pappas Stagliano are guests.

5.title: The Bev Witch Project
5.plot: The women embark on their first-ever camping trip, after receiving an invitation from prankster friends Heather Tom and Nicholle Tom; the weekend away leads to a chase by an unknown stalker, surprising confessions and a trip to the Cannes Film Festival.

6.title: The Luke Perry Incident
6.plot: When Jodie brings Beverley to a late-night industry party, the early-to-bed early-to-rise Bev takes drastic measures to stay awake; Christine tries to get her estranged Step by Step (1991) cast members together for a TV show reboot.

7.title: She's Not All That
7.plot: After years of pretending to be her own assistant to avoid saying "no" to people, a non-confrontational Beverley finally hires former child star Lori Beth Denberg to be her assistant; Jodie asks a stranger to pretend to be a fan of Christine's.

8.title: Indecent Proposals
8.plot: Christine and Jodie attend a fan convention and end up in a compromising position at the after party; Beverley shoots a TV pilot with former child star Soleil Moon Frye, but they find themselves at loggerheads as each vies for the spotlight.

imdb.plot outline: Childhood stars and friends Jodie Sweetin (Full House (1987), Christine Lakin (Step by Step (1991) and Beverley Mitchell (7th Heaven (1996) play exaggerated versions of themselves in their current lives navigating the ups of downs of living in Hollywood. The actresses support one another as they tackle marriage, parenting and reviving their acting careers.
